title: adding fp16 tests in test_nn
body_html:
The first part to fix issue #4940 . planning to update test_cuda.py next.
Uploading a draft version based on discussion with @gchanan for further discussing the best way to scan different data types for the same test, and some potential bugs in fp16(need to confirm)

One drawback about using decorators is that for different date types on the same test case, setUp() function is only run once. An alternative way it to add test for every single data type as a test case separately as we did in test_cuda.py.

body:
The first part to fix issue #4940 . planning to update test_cuda.py next. 
Uploading a draft version based on discussion with @gchanan for further discussing the best way to scan different data types for the same test, and some potential bugs in fp16(need to confirm)

One drawback about using decorators is that for different date types on the same test case, setUp() function is only run once. An alternative way it to add test for every single data type as a test case separately as we did in test_cuda.py.
